task.title: Configuring local provisioning of UE usage type based on 5G subscription
task.shortdesc: Use uutOverrideProfile command to configure the UUT override profile.

step.cmd: Create and populate a UUT override profile.

stepxmp.codeblock: cmm uutOverrideProfile create –-name f11601-07_prof cmm uutOverrideProfile modify –-name f11601-07_prof --ue5gNasNotSupported 10 cmm uutOverrideProfile modify –-name f11601-07_prof --ue5gNasSupported 20 cmm uutOverrideProfile modify –-name f11601-07_prof --ue5gcRestricted 30

step.cmd: Add the profile to UE PLMN services.
Add the profile to IMSI range services.
